When I start my computer, why does FireFox automatically open and why does it open to the Ubuntu One page?  I do NOT have my browser set to do this.  Why did Ubuntu hijack my browser settings?????
Its the default just go into preferences and change it

no its not the default.  Ubuntu has officially hijacked my browser and replaced my start page.  It also opens FireFox ON ITS OWN without my consent.  This is nothing short of a hijack and I want to know WHY and how to fix it. Who at Ubuntu thinks that we should all open our browsers to the Ubuntu One page when we start our PC?  This is FORCING the user to do something. Surely it goes against the standard Linux ethics.
